row.process:
!delete temp file : IF &UC4RB_SSH_COMMAND# <> "" : PUT_PROMPT_BUFFER AGENT# = &AGENT# : PUT_PROMPT_BUFFER LOGIN# = &LOGIN# : PUT_PROMPT_BUFFER UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_FAIL# = "YES" : PUT_PROMPT_BUFFER UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME# = &UC4B_SSH_COMMAND_FILE_PATH# : SET &UC4RB_SSH_OBJECT# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.ACTION.DELETE" : SET &ACTOBJ# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(&UC4RB_SSH_OBJECT#,WAIT) : SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,&ACTOBJ#,"RETCODE") : P "EXECUTED OBJECT [&UC4RB_SSH_OBJECT#] STATUS: &STATUS#" : IF &STATUS# <> "0" : STOP MSG, 50, "Error while executing &UC4RB_SSH_OBJECT# object" : ENDIF : IF &ACTOBJ# = "0" : SET &ERRNR# = SYS_LAST_ERR_NR() : SET &ERRINS# = SYS_LAST_ERR_INS() : SET &MESSAGE# = GET_MSG_TXT(&ERRNR#,&ERRINS#) : PRINT "Error while activating object :&MESSAGE#" : STOP MSG, 50, "Error while activating &UC4RB_SSH_OBJECT# object :&MESSAGE#" : ENDIF : ENDIF
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_CMD_STATUS_CODE# = "" :IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_COMMAND_STATUS*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &UC4RB_CMD_STATUS_CODE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &UC4RB_MAX_RETURN_CODE# <> "" : IF &UC4RB_CMD_STATUS_CODE# NE &UC4RB_MAX_RETURN_CODE# : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="Command failed" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=50 : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF :PUBLISH &UC4RB_CMD_STATUS_CODE#,,"WORKFLOW"
